rules_text:
Spectacle {3}{G} [i](You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)[/i]
Ferocious Maneater can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
flavor_text: [i]While some predators may settle for a corpse, a true apex will stand toe to toe with vampires or worse just to get a chance at fresh meat.[/i]
